channel.title: Matthew Davis
channel.description: A collection of projects, stories and thoughts about technology and politics

item.title: Do you need a blockchain?
item.description: An interactive flowchart to help cut through the hype

item.title: Web analytics are leaking into meatspace
item.description: A Stallman-esque short story about the future of offline tracking and the right to buy

item.title: Why you should think twice before riding a Lime e-bike
item.description: You really should read those terms and conditions

item.title: Achievements of the Coalition Government
item.description: A comprehensive list of (almost) everything the current Australian government has done

item.title: Machine Learning Unicycling
item.description: Teaching a computer to ride a simulated unicycle

item.title: Arduino Monitor Rotator
item.description: Build an Automatic Computer Display Rotator With an Arduino

item.title: Python Reddit Bot
item.description: How I wrote a Reddit bot in python to reply to long posts

item.title: How Flag Emojis Get Decided
item.description: Why adding an Indigenous flag is technologically non-trivial

item.title: Inverter Inertia Emulation
item.description: My bachelors thesis about emulating inertia with battery inverters
